awards.title: Trainee Research Prize
awards.description: Awarded for presenting on "Employing Generative AI to Visualize Ideal Total Hip Arthroplasty and Conduct Patient-Specific Surgical Templating on Plain Radiographs."

awards.title: Frank Stinchfield Award
awards.description: Awarded for presenting on "Creation of a Patient-specific Total Hip Arthroplasty Periprosthetic Fracture Risk Calculator."

awards.title: Trainee Research Prize
awards.description: Awarded for presenting on "Applying Deep Learning to Establish a Total Hip Arthroplasty Radiography Registry: A Stepwise Approach."

awards.title: Collegial Excellence (Peer-mentoring) Runner-Up Award
awards.description: Nomintaed by peer colleagues in the Radiology Informatics Laboratory, Mayo Clinic, MN, USA.

awards.title: National Award for the Most Sustainable Innovation in Medical Education
awards.organization: Ministry of Health and Medical Education, Iran
awards.description: Awarded for presenting on "Development, Implementation, and Evaluation of a Curriculum for the Introduction of Patient-Physician Communication Skills in Difficult Encounters."

awards.title: University Chancellor's Special Award
awards.organization: Tehran University of Medical Sciences, Tehran, Iran
awards.description: Awarded each year to one medical student who has demonstrated excellence in all aspects of their medical education.

awards.title: 3rd Place National Award for Innovation in Medical Education
awards.organization: Ministry of Health and Medical Education, Iran
awards.description: Awarded for presenting on "Development, Implementation, and Evualation of Iran International Public Health Summer School."

awards.title: Gold Medal
awards.description: A national olympiad competition on universal health coverage and public health economics.
